resources.string:
"PlutoActivity as a base Activity extends AppCompatActivity and contains Handler,Toast,PlutoDialog,AppManager,NetworkUtil,SoftInputManager and CommonAsyncTask.

" "1.Simplely you can make your all activities extends PlutoActivity.
" "2.Following under usage example of components in PlutoActivity.
"

"PlutoFragment as a base Fragment extends ProgressFragment which extends Fragment, and also is the same to PlutoActivity containing Handler,Toast,PlutoDialog,AppManager,NetworkUtil,SoftInputManager and CommonAsyncTask.

" "1.Simplely you can make your all Fragments extends PlutoFragment.
" "2.Following under usage example of components in PlutoFragment.
"

"PlutoDialog as a common defined material style Dialog that it both has system default style and some other commonly used dialog.The all you can make it easy to using in project

" "1.Simplely you can make dialog.
" "2.Following under usage example.
"

"PlutoAPIEgine is the most important part of this project.Integrating the Network framework,file Cache framework,Gson Parse,Handler with application's common logic.Finally Pluto APIEngine provides simple methods using in vary logic code. 

" "1.Simplely you can obtain flexiable data from network or cache .
" "2.Following under usage example.
"

"PlutoImageFramework is based on FinalBitmap Framework,whick is good at managing memery and deeling image async loading. 

" "1.Following under usage example.
"

"PlutoNetwork is based on Apache common-httpclient.jar developing APIClient whick integrates Http Protocal UserAgent,Cookie,Time-out,Reconnet-count,Reconnet-time,Java T to json and so on.

" "1.Following its method,you will just attented POST and GET of http.
" "2.Both sending text message and files.
" "3.Reponse is text default,and it deels text with java T to relative Result.
" "4.Also you can set Request recycle count while it request failed.
" "5.Flexiable Exception catch and throws it to PluyoException handling.

"

"PlutoFileCache is one of Pluto's Cache System.

" "1.PlutoFileCache is a singleton for add,modify,remove,acquire operation 
" "2.Managing File whether is expired.
" "3.exposing setDiskCache and getDiskCache common methord.
" "4.Following under usage example.
"

"PlutoImageFramework is based on FinalDb Framework,whick is good at managing Sqlite data translate to Java model exach other as ORM framework.

" "1.Playing attention to operate Java model to add,update,acquire and delete as JavaEE Hibernate framework 
" "2.I modified FinalDb enables to define any column as primery key.
" "3.Mainly it's a Java Reflection and Annotation Technology .
" "4.Following under usage example.
"

"PlutoException is a groba on FinalDb Framework,whick is good at managing Sqlite data translate to Java model exach other as ORM framework.

" "1.Playing attention to operate Java model to add,update,acquire and delete as JavaEE Hibernate framework 
" "2.I modified FinalDb enables to define any column as primery key.
" "3.Mainly it's a Java Reflection and Annotation Technology .
" "4.Following under usage example.
"
